Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Koya', 3: 'No... The operating speed of the action module continues to slow down!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Sorry, there are too many Corrupted on the road.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Koya', 3: 'More than half of our men had their Inver-Device destroyed and ended up as food for the Corrupted...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Don't say that! We need to keep on living!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Just wait, I will bring you back... I will... We're going home together... And we will welcome our new life together... We promised.", 4: '1'}
